question: The synthetically produced radioactive noble gas by the collision of <katex>${}_{98}^{249}Cf$</katex> with <katex>${}_{20}^{48}Ca$</katex> is
explanation: The fusion of Californium-249 and Calcium-48 produces Oganesson (Z=118): <katex>${}_{98}^{249}Cf + {}_{20}^{48}Ca \rightarrow {}_{118}^{294}Og + 3n$</katex>.
